About

About this blog

This is a personal blog about things I find genuinely interesting in AI and software development. Not takes for engagement. Not sponsored content. Just notes from someone paying attention.

I write when something strikes me as actually important — a model release that changes how I work, a tool that meaningfully improves a workflow, a shift in the landscape that people are under-reacting to. The pace is irregular. The quality is the goal.

What you'll find here

Posts fall into two main areas: AI developments (new models, research worth reading, practical usage patterns) and developer tooling (runtimes, frameworks, protocols, build tools). Occasionally both at once.

Privacy

This blog has no analytics, no tracking pixels, no cookies, no ads, no affiliate links. I don't know who reads this. That's intentional. Your attention is yours.

The RSS feed at blog.santoshchandu.com/feed.xml lets you subscribe without giving anyone your email address. It's the best way to follow along.

Contact

You can reach me at hello@santoshchandu.com. I read every email and try to reply to most of them, though it may take a while.

This site is built with Astro, hosted on Cloudflare Pages. Source code available on request. Type set in Playfair Display and Source Serif 4.
